name: FilmFactSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask Film Facts to tell me a film fact.”
”Alexa, ask Film Facts to give me a movie fact.”
”Alexa, ask Film Facts to drop some film knowledge.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: film facts
des:
Ever wondered which movie featured the first ever scene of a toilet flushing? Curious to find out how Jurassic Park created the sound of velociraptor speech? Answer these burning cinema questions with Film Facts!

Simply ask Film Facts to drop some movie knowledge and move one step closer to becoming the truest movie buff the world has ever known.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
